title: Beyoncé Classes | Peloton App | A Peloton Exclusive
author: Peloton
description:
Try the latest Beyoncé classes in the Peloton App. There's always new music and ways to work out with Peloton. And for a limited time, you can try the app free for 2 months, for new app trials only. Get ready to run, lift, meditate and flow to music made for your workout. 

Download the app to experience the Beyoncé Artist Series and more now.
US: https://www.onepeloton.com/digital/checkout/digital-60d
UK: https://www.onepeloton.co.uk/digital/checkout/digital-60d
CA: https://www.onepeloton.ca/digital/checkout/digital-60d
DE: https://www.onepeloton.de/digital/checkout/digital-60d

New App Trials Only. Terms apply. Monthly charge after trial.

localize.description:
试试佩洛顿应用程序中最新的碧昂斯课程。总会有新的音乐和和佩洛顿一起锻炼的方式。在有限的时间内，你可以免费试用这款应用程序2个月，仅限新应用程序试用。准备好跑步、举起、冥想和跟随为你的锻炼准备的音乐。

现在就下载这款应用程序，体验碧昂斯艺术家系列和更多内容。

仅限新应用程序试用版。适用条款。试用后按月收费。

localize.description:
